i5.las2peer.tools

Class ColoredOutput

  • java.lang.Object
    • i5.las2peer.tools.ColoredOutput

  • public class ColoredOutput
extends java.lang.Object
    A simple static class providing access to the color features of the bash console on standard out. All bash codes are printed in the form of \033[xxx;xxx;xxxm the methods sendCode may be used for that. The println... methods write formatted text an reset the font afterwards. The other methods switch the format of later written Text via System.out.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes

      An enumeration of possible background colors.

      Deprecated. 
      Use ColoredOutput.ForegroundColor instead!

      A color used by the ColoredOutput methods.
      static class  ColoredOutput.ForegroundColor
      An enumeration of possible foreground (text) colors.
      static class  ColoredOutput.Formatting
      An enumeration of possible text formatting options.
      static interface  ColoredOutput.ShellCode

    • Method Detail

      • colorize

        public static java.lang.String colorize(java.lang.String input,
                                        ColoredOutput.ShellCode... codes)
        This method returns the String colored/formatted with the given shell codes.
        Parameters:
        input - A String that should be colored/formatted.
        codes - A bunch of ColoredOutput.ShellCodes that should be applied on the input String.
        Returns:
        Returns the colored/formatted String or the given input String if coloring ist disabled.
